Package com.sulfurengine.ecs

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.sulfurengine.ecs.Entity
public class Entity extends Object
Represents an entity in the game world.

      public <T extends Script> T getScript(Class<T> scriptClass)
      Retrieves the script of the specified class attached to this entity.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the script.
      Parameters:
      scriptClass - The class of the script.
      Returns:
